first_translate: I don’t want you to be so shaken up...
second_translate: Being shaken up just because of a single thought from my boyfriend...

first_translate: this is just a personal question,
second_translate: …This is just something I'm personally curious about.

first_translate: but are you and siegren just dating?
second_translate: Are you and Siegren just dating?

hangle: 약혼이나 결혼 생각은 아직 없는 거고?
first_translate: have you thought about getting engaged or married?
second_translate: Have you thought about getting engaged or married yet?

first_translate: but why are you asking that all of a sudden?
second_translate: But why are you asking that so suddenly?

first_translate: it’s just that your relationship with siegren seems ambiguous.
second_translate: It’s just that your relationship with Siegren seems unclear.

hangle: 틀어지면 곤란한 사이라 적당히 사귀고 있는 건가?
first_translate: I thought maybe you were dating him casually because it would be complicated if you broke up.
second_translate: Are you dating him casually because it would be troublesome if things went wrong?

first_translate: it’s not that I feel pressured by siegren.
second_translate: It's not that Siegren makes me feel pressured.

hangle: 오히려 시그렌에 대한 내 마음이 좀 그래.
first_translate: it’s more like I’m worried about my own feelings for him.
second_translate: It’s more like I have mixed feelings about my own feelings for him.

hangle: 시그렌을 갖고 싶다고 생각하는 내 마음이.
first_translate: I find myself wanting to have him more and more.
second_translate: My feelings of wanting to have Siegren keep growing stronger.

first_translate: if you ask me if I feel pressured,
second_translate: If you're asking whether I feel pressured,
I guess I do, in a way.

first_translate: a few days later, in the capital
second_translate: A few days later, in the capital.

first_translate: I heard you made a great contribution this time.
second_translate: I heard you made a significant achievement this time.
Could you say a few words?

hangle: 나, 왜 갑자기 이렇게 인기가 폭발하는 거야!!
first_translate: why am I suddenly so popular?!
second_translate: Why am I suddenly so popular?!

hangle: 혹시… 영애가 제가 한 일에 대해서 이야기하셨나요?
first_translate: did you... tell them about what I did?
second_translate: Did you... tell them about what I did, my lady?

first_translate: I told you I’d help you, didn’t I?
second_translate: I told you I would help, didn't I?

hangle: 갑자기 이런 시선을 받는 것도 부담스러운데요.
first_translate: it’s a bit overwhelming to suddenly receive this kind of attention.
second_translate: It's a bit overwhelming to suddenly be in the spotlight like this.

first_translate: you’ll have to get used to it, my lady.
second_translate: You'll need to get used to it, my lady.

hangle: 앞으론 우리가 이렇게 사교계를 제패할 테니까.
first_translate: we’ll be conquering high society like this from now on.
second_translate: We'll be dominating high society like this from now on.

first_translate: wait, this is getting too big.

hangle: 기왕 태어난 거 꿈은 크게 가져야죠.
first_translate: since we’re born anyway, we should dream big.
second_translate: Since we're born anyway, we should dream big.
May I have this dance with you?

first_translate: I thought maybe you were dating him casually...
second_translate: Because it would be troublesome if things went wrong,

first_translate: ...because it would be complicated if you broke up.
second_translate: Are you just dating casually because breaking up would be complicated?
I'm fine... I'm all better now.

first_translate: I want to talk to you after this dance.
people are watching. put me down!
second_translate: People are watching, so put me down…!
Somewhere we can talk in private.

first_translate: I have a bad feeling about this...
second_translate: I have a bad feeling about this...

first_translate: maybe we should have gone inside.
second_translate: Maybe we should have gone inside.

first_translate: I don’t want to go to your room.
second_translate: I’m not going to your room.

first_translate: I’m not going to take you there.
it’ll be annoying if abel finds out.
second_translate: It'll be a hassle if Abel finds out.

first_translate: your feet will hurt if you stand for too long.
second_translate: Your feet will hurt if you stand too long.

first_translate: is this going to be a long conversation?

hangle: 딱, 한 번만 물을 거야. 대답해줘.
first_translate: I’m only going to ask you this once. please answer me.
second_translate: I'm only going to ask once. Answer me.
